# PKPassLibraryNotificationName

**Structure**

The types of notifications that the pass library posts.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PKPassLibraryNotificationName
```

## Creating a pass library notification name

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a pass library notification name according to the provided raw value.
- **init(_:)**: Creates a pass library notification name according to the provided string.

## Notification names

- **PKPassLibraryDidChange**: A notification that PassKit posts when the pass library changes.
- **PKPassLibraryRemotePaymentPassesDidChange**: A notification that PassKit posts when it adds or removes a pass on a paired remote device.

## Receiving notifications

- **PKPassLibraryNotificationKey**: The user info keys that a pass library notification uses.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
